tosdr.case: The terms for this service are easy to read

title: The terms for this service are easy to read
quoteText:
What this means in plain English: (however, the words our lawyers use are controlling and binding):

These are the rules to use this site, our Terms of Service or Terms of Use (call it what you want). Also, be sure to read our Privacy Policy to understand the details of how we use the data we may collect about you. If you donâ€™t like or agree to these Terms of Use and or our Privacy Policy, do not use our Site or Services.
